name: Star Defender (itch) (HydraDestroyer)
description:
This Low-Poly Style space shooter features the loved characteristics of the hyper-casual 2D top down space shooters thrust into a 3D world. Battle the horde of aliens to collect gems and power ups to reach the highest score possible. With no limit on how much the four different ships can be upgraded the highest score is only limited by your determination.

Four Different Ships:

Stealth Ship - Fastest Movement Speed, Lowest Base Attack, Lowest Base Health, Highest Fire Rate.

Fighter Ship - Second Fastest Movement Speed, Second Lowest Base Attack, Second Lowest Base Health, Second Highest Fire Rate.

Heavy Ship - Second Lowest Movement Speed, Second Highest Base Attack, Second Highest Base Health, Second Lowest Fire Rate.

Bomber Ship - Lowest Movement Speed, Highest Base Attack, Highest Base Health, Lowest Fire Rate.
